title: ambA un mEl
sahitya:
amba un mEl bhAram jagadamba un mEl bhAram


anupallavi

  vambavak-kaDalil shiru turumbu pOla-lakkaNuTrEn
 maru karai kANEn nInda vallamaiyum illEn


caraNam    mAyai iruL shUzhnda pava vAridhi shuzhalil poruL
maNbeNNenum mUvAshaiyAm mArutat-talaiyal uTrEn
tAyE unranraNNaruLait-tandAl anRO uyvE ninrEl
tArakam vEruNDO jagatkAraNi nAraNi nIyE
mATSimaiyuTra kATAkSa vIkSaNiyattAl aDimai
mITSi pera sheidarul kATSi taralAgAdO
sAkSiyoru kOT aruL ATSiyE anbarkkuk-kANi
ATSiyallavO nIlAyatAkSiyE sarva sAkSiyE
